name: TX_ANES_INFO
description: The TX_ANES_INFO table contains one record for each anesthesia transaction record in your system. The data contained in each record consists of no-add, single-response anesthesia information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique key or identification number for a given transaction.

columns.name: SUP_UNIT_PX_TOT
columns.description: The total number of units of supplemental unit procedures for this procedure.

columns.name: AGE_UNIT_PX_ID
columns.description: If your Anesthesia Pricing master file is set up to use age and emergency unit procedures, this column holds the value of anesthesia age unit procedure ID.

columns.name: EMERG_UNIT_PX_ID
columns.description: If your Anesthesia Pricing master file is set up to use age and emergency unit procedures, this column holds the value of anesthesia emergency unit procedure ID.

columns.name: IS_INDPNDT_CRNA_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this is an independent Certified Registered Nurse Anesthetist (CRNA) charge transaction. Y indicates it is an independent CRNA charge, and N or null indicate it is not an independent CRNA charge.

columns.name: ASA_CODE_ID
columns.description: The ASA code for this anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: AGE_UNT_PX_UNIT
columns.description: If your Anesthesia Pricing master file is set up to use age and emergency unit procedures, this column holds the value of the number of anesthesia age unit procedure units for this charge.

columns.name: EMERG_UNIT_PX_UNIT
columns.description: If your Anesthesia Pricing master file is set up to use age and emergency unit procedures, this column holds the value of the number of anesthesia emergency unit procedure units for this charge.

columns.name: SUP_PX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: If your Anesthesia Pricing master file is set up to use age and emergency unit procedures, this column specifies the special procedure type: 1) Age Unit 2) Emergency Unit

columns.name: ANESTHESIA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The anesthesia type category number for the anesthesia charge.

columns.name: EMERGENCY_STATUS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the anesthesia charge has an emergency status.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The physical status category number for the anesthesia charge.

columns.name: CONCURRENCY_OVERRID
columns.description: The concurrency value that overrode the standard concurrency value that was calculated.

columns.name: BASE_UNITS
columns.description: The uniform factor applied for this anesthesia transaction regardless of the procedureï¿½s length.

columns.name: TIMED_UNITS
columns.description: The time units for this anesthesia transaction as determined by the length of the procedure.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_ST_UNITS
columns.description: The physical status units for this anesthesia transaction.

columns.name: EMERGENCY_UNITS
columns.description: The emergency units for this anesthesia transaction.

columns.name: AGE_UNITS
columns.description: The age units for this anesthesia transaction.

columns.name: CRNA_CHARGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the certified registered nurse anesthetist (CRNA) charge transaction that is associated with this anesthesia transaction.

columns.name: ORIG_ANES_CHG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the anesthesia charge transaction that is associated with this certified registered nurse anesthetist (CRNA) transaction.

columns.name: MED_SUP_MOD_OVR_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the modifier based on the concurrency calculation for this anesthesia transaction that is normally included on claims has been overridden with the modifier corresponding to a medically supervised case.

columns.name: BASE_UNIT_OVERRIDE
columns.description: This specifies that the base unit has been overridden. The previous base units are stored in it, if this is empty then the base units are not overridden.
